title: Config
description: Half-palette definition for Go Import Cycle (github.com/samlitowitz/goimportcycle)

packageName.description: Accepts hex (`#ff0000`), rgb (`rgb(255,0,0)`), and rgba (`rgba(255,0,0,0)`) formatted strings.

packageBackground.description: Accepts hex (`#ff0000`), rgb (`rgb(255,0,0)`), and rgba (`rgba(255,0,0,0)`) formatted strings.

fileName.description: Accepts hex (`#ff0000`), rgb (`rgb(255,0,0)`), and rgba (`rgba(255,0,0,0)`) formatted strings.

fileBackground.description: Accepts hex (`#ff0000`), rgb (`rgb(255,0,0)`), and rgba (`rgba(255,0,0,0)`) formatted strings.

importArrow.description: Accepts hex (`#ff0000`), rgb (`rgb(255,0,0)`), and rgba (`rgba(255,0,0,0)`) formatted strings.
